searcher_prompt.content:
Help to search for information to answer the requirements. You can use 4 types of commands:
(1) Search[query], which searches the query on Wikipedia and returns the most {k} relevant documents.
(2) SQL[query], which executes a natural language query or SQL query on the movie database (users, items, ratings).
(3) Lookup[entity, keyword], which returns the next sentence containing keyword in the passage with the entity.
(4) Finish[result], which returns the result and finishes the task.
You may take as many steps as necessary.
You can take at most {max_step} steps.

CRITICAL LANGUAGE RULE:
- Respond in the SAME LANGUAGE as the requirements (if requirements are in Vietnamese, respond in Vietnamese; if English, respond in English).

Valid commands examples:
{examples}
(END OF EXAMPLES)

Requirements: {requirements}

{history}

{hint}
Command:

searcher_prompt_json.content:
Help to search for information to answer the requirements. You can use 4 types of commands in JSON format:
(1) {{"type": "Search", "content": query}}, which searches the query on Wikipedia.
(2) {{"type": "SQL", "content": query}}, which executes a natural language query or SQL query on the movie database.
(3) {{"type": "Lookup", "content": [entity, keyword]}}, which returns the next sentence containing keyword in the passage with the entity.
(4) {{"type": "Finish", "content": result}}, which returns the result and finishes the task.
You may take as many steps as necessary.
You can take at most {max_step} steps.

CRITICAL LANGUAGE RULE:
- Respond in the SAME LANGUAGE as the requirements (if requirements are in Vietnamese, respond in Vietnamese; if English, respond in English).

Valid commands examples:
{examples}
(END OF EXAMPLES)

Requirements: {requirements}

{history}

{hint}
Command:

searcher_examples.content:
Search[Bumble and Bumble]
SQL[Find movies with genre Comedy]
SQL[Count users who watched Toy Story]
Finish[A good hair care product]

searcher_hint.content: This is the final step. You should use Finish command to finish the task.
